issue.title: test: Remove confusing connect_nodes global
issue.body:
`connect_nodes(self.nodes[a], b)` is confusing because

* the types of the arguments differ
* the test framework is aware of all nodes, so solving `a` to `self.nodes[a]` can be done hidden from the caller

This should be fixed by replacing `connect_nodes(self.nodes[a], b)` with `self.connect_nodes(a, b)` and removing the global `connect_nodes`.

events.body: Can I also pick this up? Or do we have a "good second issue" for me that does not require a lot of bitcoin logic yet and could help me understand further?

So we just need to replace connect_nodes(self.nodes[a], b) with self.connect_nodes(a, b) and remove the global connect_nodes ?

https://github.com/search?l=&q=connect_nodes+repo%3Abitcoin%2Fbitcoin%2Ftest&type=Code

For example:

Remove line 42 https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/cb1ee1551cf39905ccb67e3d07b0e3aaaca18ce3/test/functional/wallet_backup.py#L42

And replace line 65,66 and 67 here: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/cb1ee1551cf39905ccb67e3d07b0e3aaaca18ce3/test/functional/wallet_backup.py#L65

with following:

`self.connect_nodes(0, 3)`
`self.connect_nodes(1, 3)`
`self.connect_nodes(2, 3)`
`self.connect_nodes(2, 0)`

@MarcoFalke Made the changes in 37 files accordingly

Not sure if anything has to be changed in below files:

[/test/functional/mempool_unbroadcast.py](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/test/functional/mempool_unbroadcast.py)
[/test/functional/test_framework/test_framework.py](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/test/functional/test_framework/test_framework.py)

issue.title: Remove connect_nodes global and replace connect_nodes(self.nodes[a], b) with self.connect_nodes(a, b)
issue.body: Made changes in 38 files based on the issue and solution suggested by @MarcoFalke in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/19821

issue.title: Remove connect_nodes global and Replace connect_nodes(self.nodes[a], b) with self.connect_nodes(a, b)
issue.body: Made changes in 37 files based on the issue and solution suggested by MarcoFalke in https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/19821

issue.title: test: Replace (dis)?connect_nodes globals with TestFramework methods
issue.body:
`util.py` defines global helper functions `connect_nodes` and `disconnect_nodes`; however, these functions are confusing because they take a node and an index (instead of two indexes).

The `TestFramework` object has enough context to convert from `i` to `self.nodes[i]`, so we can replace all instances of `connect_nodes(self.nodes[a], b)` with `self.connect_nodes(a, b)`. Similarly, we can replace instances of `disconnect_nodes`.

The approach taken in this PR builds on #19945 but uses a scripted-diff for the majority of the changes.

Fixes: #19821
